author: forthommel
body:
This PR defines the geometry for the UFSD planes replacing the diamonds' planes 4 in sectors 45 and 56 in 2017.
It also redefines a few diamond volumes' parentage to ease the alignment procedure for all subdetectors.

The re-reco of 2017 data with UFSDs is dependent on this PR.

`runTheMatrix.py -l limited` yielded `19 18 17 14 8 1 1 1 tests passed, 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed` (usual `4.22` DAS problem, and "Connection timed out problem" while opening `RecoPixelVertexing/PixelLowPtUtilities/data/pixelShapePhase1_noL1.par` in step2 of `7.3`)
title: CTPPS: Geometry for UFSDetectors
